Name: Resilio Sync
Operating system: Windows  OS X  Linux  FreeBSD  Android  iOS

Name: Briefcase (part of Windows) (removed in Windows 10 build 14942[20])
Cobian Backup
Comments: Backup software with folder synchronization feature; remote management; Shadow Copy

Name: Windows Mobile Device Center
Comments: Syncs mobile devices; successor to Microsoft ActiveSync

Name: Microsoft Sync Framework
Comments: Syncs files  data  services; a framework  not a tool

Name: Windows Live Mesh (discontinued 13 February 2013)
Operating system: Windows (Vista and greater)  Windows Mobile  OSX

Name: OmniGroup OmniPresence
Operating system: OSX  OmniGroup software for iOS  open source framework available
Prior file versions revision control: {{no}}  via local Time Machine backup only
Comments: Sync local folders via OmniSync or WebDAV server but not to the server itself
Scheduling: {{no}}  syncs whenever it's online and not paused

Name: Windows Live Sync (discontinued 31 March 2011)
Comments: Sync folders  browse devices from website  remote access; was Microsoft FolderShare  20 000 file limit
